import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import imageSrc from "../../assets/images/profile.jpg"; function Navigation({toggleSidebar, sidebarOpen}){ const [searchOpen, setSearchOpen] = React.useState(false); const toggleSearch = () => { setSearchOpen(!searchOpen); }; return(
); } export default Navigation;
